metadata.name: Knowledge Network
metadata.notes: Interconnected nodes showing knowledge building and connections

theme.concept: knowledge network with interconnected nodes spreading outward from center
theme.visual_metaphor: neural network or mycelium spreading and connecting

composition.visual_flow: radiating outward from central hub with interconnecting pathways

colors.distribution: blue nodes and connections, orange highlights on key connection points

elements.background: smaller distant nodes with soft edges
elements.foreground: larger clearer central hub and primary nodes
